page.title: 18HOUSING AROUND BYWELL ROAD.
page.content: Bywell Road has a variety of houses mainly brick terrace or semi-detached, some being stone or stone fronted along with some modern houses in manufactured stone. To the NE of Bywell Road are semi-detached houses and bungalows in brick, whilst to the SW are brick semi-detached houses and bungalows with some terrace houses, both council and privately owned. The Old Bank area has old terrace stone fronted houses with a few modern old people's bungalows. The Bennett Lane area has two roads of imposing buildings of various styles, along with roads of semi-detached and detached private property. Leeds Road has stone built terrace houses, the older ones being closer to Dewsbury with some old mill cottages recently refurbished. Off Leeds Road at Shaw Cross are modern houses in brick.
